text: "Who Are You" is a 1978 song by The Who and is the title track to their eighth studio album Who Are You. It went to number 18 in the United Kingdom, number 14 in the United States, number 7 in Canada, number 44 in the Netherlands and number 23 in New Zealand. It was used as the theme song to CSI: Crime Scene Investigation. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:The Who songs
title: Who Are You (The Who song)
